# Namel3ss Code of Conduct

A respectful, thoughtful community builds a better language.

Namel3ss exists to make AI-native software development intuitive, safe, and beautifully designed. We expect everyone in the community to act with kindness, respect, clarity, and professionalism.

This Code of Conduct applies to all project spaces, including GitHub issues, discussions, pull requests, documentation, community channels, and any interactions involving the Namel3ss community.

---

## ğŸŒŸ Our Pledge
We pledge to make participation in Namel3ss a welcoming, harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of:

- age  
- gender identity and expression  
- sexual orientation  
- disability  
- mental or physical health  
- personal appearance  
- body size  
- race or ethnicity  
- nationality  
- religion or belief  
- experience level  
- background or identity  

We want contributors and users to feel safe, valued, and respected.

---

## ğŸŒ± Our Standards
### ğŸ’ Examples of behavior that contribute to a positive environment
- Being kind, patient, and considerate  
- Offering constructive feedback gracefully  
- Asking questions with curiosity  
- Helping others learn the language and tools  
- Respecting differing viewpoints and experiences  
- Focusing on what is best for the community  
- Celebrating meaningful, thoughtful contributions  

### ğŸš« Examples of unacceptable behavior
- Harassment, insults, or derogatory remarks  
- Threats or violent language  
- Discriminatory jokes or comments  
- Personal attacks or trolling  
- Publishing private information without consent  
- Dismissing or belittling someoneâ€™s contribution  
- Disrupting discussions or pulling the conversation off-topic  

---

## ğŸ¯ Our Responsibilities
Project maintainers are responsible for:

- clarifying community standards  
- reviewing and merging contributions fairly  
- responding to issues and questions respectfully  
- taking corrective action when inappropriate behavior occurs  

Maintainers may remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, issues, or other contributions that do not align with this Code of Conduct. Repeated violations may result in temporary or permanent bans from community spaces.

---

## ğŸ“¬ Enforcement
If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, please report it by contacting the maintainers at:

**conduct@namel3ss.dev**  
(Replace with your preferred email if different.)

All reports will be reviewed promptly, respectfully, and confidentially.

---

## ğŸŒ Scope
This Code of Conduct applies within:

- GitHub repositories  
- Issues and pull requests  
- Community discussions and channels  
- Documentation and wiki contributions  
- Any public or private community interaction related to Namel3ss  

Maintainers may enforce this Code of Conduct in any environment where the community operates.

---

## ğŸ’™ Our Commitment
Namel3ss is built with care, creativity, and ambition. We believe communities grow strongest when they are:

- inclusive  
- respectful  
- safe  
- collaborative  
- calm and intentional  

By participating, you help shape a world-class language and ecosystem.

Thank you for being part of Namel3ss.
